verses.verse: It happened <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Who should go <S%H5927>up<s%> for us <S%H8462>first<s%> against the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> to fight against <S%H3898>them?<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3063>"Judah<s%> shall go <S%H5927>up.<s%> <S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I have delivered the <S%H776>land<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> "Come <S%H5927>up<s%> with me into my <S%H1486>lot,<s%> that we may <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H3669>Canaanites;<s%> and I likewise will <S%H1980>go<s%> with you into your <S%H1486>lot.<s%>" So <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> went with <S%H3212>him.<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> went <S%H5927>up;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and they <S%H5221>struck<s%> of them in <S%H966>Bezek<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

They <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H137>Adoni-Bezek<s%> in <S%H966>Bezek;<s%> and they <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H5221>him,<s%> and they struck the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites.<s%>

But <S%H137>Adoni-Bezek<s%> <S%H5127>fled;<s%> and they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H270>him,<s%> and caught <S%H7112>him,<s%> and cut off his <S%H931>thumbs<s%> and his great <S%H7272>toes.<s%>

<S%H137>Adoni-Bezek<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7657>"Seventy<s%> <S%H4428>kings,<s%> having their <S%H931>thumbs<s%> and their great <S%H7272>toes<s%> cut <S%H7112>off,<s%> <S%H3950>scavenged<s%> under my <S%H7979>table:<s%> as I have <S%H6213>done,<s%> so <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7999>requited<s%> <S%H935>me.<s%>" They brought him to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and he died <S%H4191>there.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5221>it,<s%> and struck it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H7971>set<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire.<s%>

<S%H310>Afterward<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H5045>country,<s%> and in the South, and in the <S%H8219>lowland.<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> against the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> (now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> was Kiriath <S%H7153>Arba<s%>); and they <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H8344>Sheshai,<s%> and <S%H289>Ahiman,<s%> and <S%H8526>Talmai.<s%>
From there he <S%H3212>went<s%> against the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir.<s%> (Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> was Kiriath <S%H7158>Sepher.<s%>)

<S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "He who <S%H5221>strikes<s%> Kiriath <S%H7158>Sepher,<s%> and <S%H3920>takes<s%> <S%H5414>it,<s%> to him will I give <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> as <S%H802>wife.<s%>"

<S%H6274>Othniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%>'s <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5414>it:<s%> and he gave him <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> as <S%H802>wife.<s%>

It <S%H935>happened,<s%> when she came, that she <S%H5496>got<s%> him to <S%H7592>ask<s%> her <S%H1>father<s%> for a <S%H7704>field:<s%> and she <S%H6795>alighted<s%> from off her <S%H2543>donkey;<s%> and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> said to <S%H559>her,<s%> "What would you like?"

She <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3051>him,<s%> "Give me a <S%H1293>blessing;<s%> for that you have <S%H5414>set<s%> me in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5045>South,<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me also <S%H1543>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%>" Then <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> her the <S%H5942>upper<s%> <S%H1543>springs<s%> and the <S%H8482>lower<s%> <S%H1543>springs.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H7017>Kenite,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>brother-in<s%>-law, went <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of palm <S%H8558>trees<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> which is in the <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H6166>Arad;<s%> and they <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> with <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and they <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> who <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> <S%H6857>Zephath,<s%> and utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H8034>it.<s%> The name of the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H2767>Hormah.<s%>
Also <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> with its <S%H1366>border,<s%> and <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> with its <S%H1366>border,<s%> and <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> with its <S%H1366>border.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was with <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and drove <S%H3423>out<s%> the inhabitants of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H3808>country;<s%> for he could not drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley,<s%> because they had <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron.<s%>

They <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> to <S%H3612>Caleb,<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken:<s%> and he <S%H3423>drove<s%> out there the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> did not drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> who <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> but the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
The <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> they also went <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H1008>Bethel;<s%> and Yahweh was with <S%H3068>them.<s%>
The <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> sent to <S%H8446>spy<s%> out <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%> (Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> was <S%H3870>Luz.<s%>)

The <S%H8104>watchers<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>him,<s%> "Please show us the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and we will <S%H6213>deal<s%> kindly with <S%H2617>you.<s%>"

He <S%H7200>showed<s%> them the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> into the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and they <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> but they let the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> and all his <S%H4940>family.<s%>

The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> its <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3870>Luz,<s%> which is its <S%H8034>name<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> did not drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the inhabitants of Beth <S%H1052>Shean<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> nor <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2991>Ibleam<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns;<s%> but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H2974>would<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in that <S%H776>land.<s%>

It <S%H3478>happened,<s%> when Israel had grown <S%H2388>strong,<s%> that they <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> to forced <S%H4522>labor,<s%> and did not <S%H3423>utterly<s%> drive them <S%H3423>out.<s%>

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H3423>didn't<s%> drive out the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H1507>Gezer;<s%> but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> among <S%H7130>them.<s%>

<S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> <S%H3423>didn't<s%> drive out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H7003>Kitron,<s%> nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5096>Nahalol;<s%> but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H4522>them,<s%> and became subject to forced labor.

<S%H836>Asher<s%> <S%H3423>didn't<s%> drive out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5910>Acco,<s%> nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> nor of <S%H303>Ahlab,<s%> nor of <S%H392>Achzib,<s%> nor of <S%H2462>Helbah,<s%> nor of <S%H663>Aphik,<s%> nor of <S%H7340>Rehob;<s%>
but the <S%H843>Asherites<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> for they did not drive them <S%H3423>out.<s%>

<S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> <S%H3423>didn't<s%> drive out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh,<s%> nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of Beth <S%H1043>Anath;<s%> but he <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%> nevertheless the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh<s%> and of Beth <S%H1043>Anath<s%> became subject to forced <S%H4522>labor.<s%>

The <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H3905>forced<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H5414>country;<s%> for they would not allow them to come <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6010>valley;<s%>

but the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H2974>would<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2776>Heres,<s%> in <S%H357>Aijalon,<s%> and in <S%H8169>Shaalbim:<s%> yet the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3513>prevailed,<s%> so that they became subject to forced <S%H4522>labor.<s%>
The <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> was from the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H4610>Akrabbim,<s%> from the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and <S%H4605>upward.<s%>
